Write-Up Text: People on social media have been discussing Australian politics and the upcoming budget. Some expressed frustration with the government's budgeting practices and cuts to programs while others applauded new initiatives like the Small Business Energy Incentive. There were also criticisms of the Labor Party's plan to cap spending on the National Disability Insurance Scheme. Experts weighed in suggesting an aspirational approach to support country Australia. Some posts were critical of political analysis while others were brief and forceful. Overall social media users expressed a range of opinions and sentiments towards Australian politics and the upcoming budget.
